QuestData.Title: The Last of Her Kind
QuestData.Description: For as long as I can remember, we've obtained our best bears from the Hibernal Cave to the east.$B$BThose times might finally be gone. The cave has been overrun by ravenous jormungar and the wild bears are all but extinct.$B$BIf you were to find a surviving matriarch, however, I would guarantee you that she would fight better than any of these bears born in captivity.$B$BTake this harness to the Hibernal Cave and rescue a surviving matriarch. Good luck finding one.
QuestData.LogDescription: Astrid Bjornrittar in Brunnhildar Village wants you to rescue an Icemaw Matriarch in the Hibernal Cavern.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm impressed. I never thought I would see an icemaw matriarch again. Especially not one this size.
